content:
We're interested in beginning the process of adding support for wasi-gfx in Wasmtime, probably behind an experimental flag for now.

How should we move forward with this? Who are the right people to discuss this with?
@Till Schneidereit @fitzgen (he/him) @Pat Hickey @Alex Crichton
best thing to do would probably be to add an agenda item to the next wasmtime meeting and talk about it there

In the meantime, does it make sense to discuss the process with some of the maintainers 1:1? I've never contributed to Wasmtime in the past, and this is going to be a big project, I could probably use some input from existing maintainers.
